name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Accomplished Principal Cloud Engineer with 10+ years of experience driving cloud engineering excellence through expertise in **Azure**, **GCP**, and **Terraform**. Deeply proficient in **GIT**, **Ansible**, and **Puppet**, with a solid foundation in CI/CD practices to ensure seamless deployment and integration of cloud-native applications. Proven history of technical leadership, fostering a collaborative community spirit, and motivating teams to innovate and solve complex problems efficiently. Experienced in delivering high-performance software solutions and leading multi-disciplinary teams that produce maintainable, secure applications compliant with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, brings robust skills across the full technology stack including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, alongside a practical background in MLOps utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about leveraging advanced technology to drive real-world impact and enhance organizational effectiveness.
